contractRecordsTO.projectDescription: The project consists of two buildings. One of the buildings is located at Lainchaur. It is 8 storeyed RCC Framed modern building. Another building is located at Bhagwanpaau. It is 4 storeyed building with typical Newari architecture (Slopped Jhingati roof and exposed Brick facade).
